Description: We are looking for a skilled and experienced metal painter to join our team. The ideal candidate will have experience in electroplating and be able to apply different types of metal coatings to a variety of objects. They will also be able to follow safety procedures and work independently.Skills
Skills:
Prepare metal surfaces for electroplating by cleaning, degreasing, and sanding.
Mix and apply metal coatings to metal objects.
Inspect finished products for defects.
Maintain and troubleshoot electroplating equipment.
Follow safety procedures and regulations.
